alert.note: Alert for Pasco (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 16 at 9:24AM EDT until further notice by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... Cypress Creek At SR 54 Worthington Gardens affecting Pasco County. Myakka River At Myakka River State Park affecting Sarasota County. Peace River At Bartow affecting Polk County. Horse Creek Near Arcadia at SR 72 affecting DeSoto County. .With recent heavy rainfall, area rivers have reached or will reach minor flood stage. For the Cypress Creek...including SR 54 Worthington Gardens...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Myakka...including Myakka River State Park...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Peace...including Bartow, Arcadia at SR 70...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Horse Creek...including Arcadia at SR 72...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cypress Creek At SR 54 Worthington Gardens. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Flooding threatens two homes on State Road 54. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM EDT Friday the stage was 9.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 AM EDT Friday was 9.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain steady above flood stage at 9.7 feet. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.7 feet on 08/11/2004. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 am EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Tue Wed Cypress Creek SR 54 Worthington 8.0 9.7 Fri 9 am 9.7 9.7 9.7 9.7 9.6 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 1230 AM EDT.
